name: Ozeri ZB15 Precision Pro II Digital Bathroom Scale

reviews.name: Ozeri 440 lbs Precision Pro II Bath Scale with Weight Change Detection
reviews.reviewText:
I get on and I weigh 224.5... Then I get on again and weigh 218.0... Then I take my cloths off and weigh 218.4....

Piece of Junk
reviews.title: Not accurate - Inconsistent weighs

reviews.name: Ozeri 440 lbs Precision Pro II Bath Scale with Weight Change Detection
reviews.title: jerry

reviews.name: Ozeri 440 lbs Precision Pro II Bath Scale with Weight Change Detection
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two different scales from the same brand, one for each bathroom. Very happy with both, they're accurate, reasonably priced and look nice.
reviews.title: Two Thumbs up

reviews.name: Ozeri 440 lbs Precision Pro II Bath Scale with Weight Change Detection
reviews.reviewText: Purchased scale for office weight loss challenge. The weight tracking feature makes it a great choice for those who are trying to lose weight. Everyone has commented positively on its accuracy. The thin design makes it easy to store. Nice clean modern design.
reviews.title: Quick, accurate and easy to read

reviews.name: Ozeri 440 lbs Precision Pro II Bath Scale with Weight Change Detection
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for our office and I'd have to say it works great.
reviews.title: Perfect for our goals!
